lines.text: Wanna know what a cockroach is called in Algeria?
Why the fuck would someone want to know that?
One of us is not a stripper. One of us is a lyin' bitch who's fuckin' Montello, and now she's fuckin' all of us!
Who are you callin' a bitch, you fuckin' ho?
You couldn't table-dance your way out of a paper bag!

[gets out her gun]
Ooh, you fuckin' mother-fucker!

[cuts her]
I know what she said! And I said relax. So put the gun away. I said put the gun away!

[does so]
I could win a fuckin' Nobel Prize for table-dancing.
Everybody has to keep our heads.
Prepare to meet your maker - maybe he'll know who the FUCK you are!
